Literature.Title: There are abundant antimicrobial peptides in brains of two kinds of Bombina toads.
Literature.Author: Liu R, Liu H, Ma Y, Wu J, Yang H, Ye H, Lai R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=up to 250 µg/ml,Rabbit erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=up to 250 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 20032(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=>100µg/ml)
